cmd.deployFlavorMixUI.description: Deploys the customer-facing Flavor Mix UI to Netlify.
cmd.deployFlavorMixUI.when_to_use: After staging and verifying flavor badge logic.

cmd.capturePOSWaitlist.description: Activates waitlist form for POS plugin.
cmd.capturePOSWaitlist.when_to_use: During Phase 3 GTM push to capture POS interest.

cmd.fireSession.description: Triggers live session interface for lounge operator.
cmd.fireSession.when_to_use: When a new session starts in lounge.

cmd.deployToNetlify.description: Deploys entire repo to Netlify using main branch settings.
cmd.deployToNetlify.when_to_use: Anytime a major push needs to be reflected on hookahplus.net.

cmd.pushPricingSheetPDF.description: Pushes the latest Hookah+ pricing sheet to GTM portal.

cmd.seedReflexAgent.description: Seeds and activates a Reflex Agent into session trust loop.
cmd.seedReflexAgent.when_to_use: Post-deploy, or during operator session setup.
